nodes.text: Rorak 5 was a space station above Rorak 4, near Nar Shaddaa. It was a meeting point of Hutt clan leaders, pirates and traders.

There, Krayn and his Wookiee bodyguard Rashtah met in 29 BBY with the Colicoids and Bakleeda—Obi-Wan Kenobi in disguise, in order to save his Padawan Anakin Skywalker from the oppressive lifetime fate of being a spice slave. Nor Fik, the principal Colicoid negotiator, brought "Bakleeda" into the business meeting as a Colicoid advisor and imminent inspector of the Nar Shaddaa spice-processing operations.
